wikitext.*:
'''Delta 4 Software''' was a British game publisher, specializing in parody games.

Founded by [[Fergus McNeill]], it published and created the ''[[Hairy Toes]]''-series,<ref name="El Anillo">[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=4 Merristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 5 (retrieved 22 September 2010)</ref> with was divided in two parts: ''[[Bored of the Rings (video game)|Bored of the Rings]]''<ref name="El Anillo"/><ref>[http://www.worldofspectrum.org/infoseekid.cgi?id=0006036 Bored of the Rings] at [[wikipedia:World of Spectrum|World of Spectrum]]</ref><ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/bored.html Bored of the Rings at Tolkien Games (retrieved 22 September 2010)]</ref> and ''[[The Boggit]]''.<ref name="El Anillo"/><ref>[http://www.worldofspectrum.org/infoseek.cgi The Boggit] at [[wikipedia:World of Spectrum|World of Spectrum]] (retrieved 22 September 2010)</ref><ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/boggit.html The Boggit] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 22 September 2010)</ref>
